name: Cheezu
description:
Cheezu - "The Photo Maze Game!"

Test your maze skills with increasing levels of difficulty as you race to the finish. The fastest finishing times are saved for each level. To navigate the maze, swipe or tap the screen in the direction you wish to move. Tilt the device, pinch the screen and use the zoom buttons to help guide you to your goal.

The game comes included with several images, but it gets more interesting when you use your own pictures. If your device has a camera, you can also use an image from the camera roll or take a new picture to use in the game.
